title: kasunrandil
author: kasunrandil
content: image post                         you can see all the details on their official  page.  link below            https://twitter.com/volare_official/status/1547039666368823296

comments.author: Tarz
comments.body: I didnt know volare was rolled out already. No one shot a DM to my mailbox to warn about upcoming launch of the slickest network in town. Something must be padded here. Whoever is behind this very phenomenal gimmick appears to be borderline secretive to deliver a wideopen announcement on their internal goings. Volare must be in the process of going through the first round of private funding. No one should know.
